description.ko: 금속과 네온사인이 비 내리는 밤 아래서 상호작용하는 미래 도시 풍경의 낭만적인 비전입니다.
description.en: A romanticized vision of a futuristic urban landscape where metal and neon light interact under the cover of rain.

prompt: A high-angle cinematic view of a rain-slicked cyberpunk alleyway, saturated with #FF00FF and #00FFFF neon signage reflecting in hyper-realistic #1A0033 asphalt puddles. Futuristic urban textures of rusted #FF6B35 metal and wet carbon fiber. Massive holographic fish swim between high-density spires. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing, cinematic volumetric fog, sharp focus on raindrops falling through neon beams, capturing a digital romance.
